text:
ANN ARBOR
WHOM
91.7 M.C.
FLINT WFUM 107.1 M.C.
UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
WALDO ABBOT. DIRECTOR OF BROADCASTING
ANN ARBOR. MICH.
E. G. BURROWS, program director
16 August 195^
Dear Miss Biason:
I'd like very much to be able to maintain
my own file-copy of those "Newsletters1â€™ using
my articles on P/R and Publicity.
If it wouldn't cause too much disruption
down there, could you arrange to send me same?
I have the July issue, but have not been able to
obtain the August. The station receives a single
copy which Abbot binds into an inviolable folder.
Incidentally, I've just mailed to Siegel
the copy for September. You should probably
receive it within the next few days.
Regards,
